name: N00LYn3
description:
- You have one minute to reach the bottom without being hit by one of the bricks.

- You have 30 seconds of "Day" time, where you get to control the "Character". Use the Left/Right arrow keys to move left or right. But! You only have one move. To recharge, hit the space bar to enter "Night" time. - You have 30 seconds of "Night" time. It takes two seconds to recharge your character move. Use the Left/Right arrow keys to slow down/speed up the up/down movement of the bricks.
